tool.name: MAIQMag Inversion Inference
tool.description: A tool to predict Hamiltonian parameters
tool.command: export TORCHINDUCTOR_CACHE_DIR=/tmp/torchinductor && pixi run --as-is --manifest-path /app python -m maiqmag_ml infer_inversion --ckpt $model --inp_file $input_data --out_file res.png > >(tee -a $output) 2> >(tee -a $output >&2) mv res.png $result
tool.help:
**MAIQMag Inversion Inference**
This is a Galaxy tool to predict Hamiltonian parameters using AI.
